cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.SI, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with information loss in a downsampling system, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT) and signal processing (cs.SP). The use of anti-aliasing filters is also a common technique in signal processing (cs.SP). The paper also discusses the design of optimal filters, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM). Finally, the paper discusses the use of statistical assumptions to bound the information loss, which is a topic in statistics (cs.SI).
